name: 5 - Prepared
description:
Your essay is very well written. This response shows excellent command over writing an argument with valid reasoning and sufficient evidence. You have included a well developed introduction and conclusion, with superior skill in language and Standard English.
To improve your score: You can still improve your score by more practice. Develop your introduction and conclusion, while also expanding on the evidence that you use to support your claim. Writing well takes practice, but you have an excellent foundation.
